answer: The current work utilizes existing methods for studying superfluid properties of bosons on a lattice, such as the Beliaev-Popov formalism, as seen in cond-mat/0103055.
explanation: This paper extends the Beliaev-Popov formalism to study superfluid properties of bosons on a deformable lattice, making it relevant to the current work.
evidence_quote: extension of the Beliaev - Popov formalism
